name: Fanken Girl Maker
description:
Culture the cells to create eyes, nose, mouth and other features and fuse them to make your own Franken girl.

Step 1 : Place the seeds into a beaker that will be grown up as eyes, nose, mouth and other features.
Step 2 : Cultivate the seeds sincerely.
Step 3 : Collect the grown up parts and fuse them.
Step 4 : Finally, name the Franken girl. Easy!

Let us introduce the a unique concept collecting game 'Franken girl'.
This game is to culture and fuse the cells in order to make players' own Franken girl.
The more Franken girls being created the more research supporting fund increases.
You can create a Franken girl with vastly superior quality by using good materials and upgrade the laboratory with increased research fund.

Your own Franken girl, Let's make one!

Features
- Collecting game with unique concept
- Huge number of styles you can make with various avatar items
- Mysterious story that be gradually revealed
- Interesting conversations with Franken girls
- Various items that helpful to experiment
- Research fund that increases with the quality of franken girls
- Laboratory upgrade system that enables player to create high quality franken girls
- Quality ranking system and The Number Of Creation ranking system
- Quest system that gives huge rewards
- Simple controls for anyone to enjoy
